findings.title: RSML - Redundant SafeMath Library
findings.description: Using SafeMath library for arithmetic operations that are already handled by Solidity versions greater than or equal to 0.8.0.

findings.title: IDI - Immutable Declaration Improvement
findings.description: Variables initialized only in the constructor and not defined as immutable, preventing Solidity compiler optimizations.

findings.title: L04 - Conformance to Solidity Naming Conventions
findings.description: Not following Solidity style guide for naming conventions, affecting code readability and maintainability.

findings.title: L05 - Unused State Variable
findings.description: Declared state variable is never used in the contract's functions, creating clutter and increasing deployment cost.

findings.title: L07 - Missing Events Arithmetic
findings.description: Missing events for logging information about changes or actions within the contract, affecting external party notifications.

findings.title: L09 - Dead Code Elimination
findings.description: Presence of unreachable code that is never executed during normal contract execution, increasing deployment cost and complexity.

findings.title: L13 - Divide before Multiply Operation
findings.description: Performing divisions before multiplications may cause a loss of precision in arithmetic calculations.

findings.title: L16 - Validate Variable Setters
findings.description: Missing checks for zero values in user-supplied input, leading to potential problems during contract execution.

findings.title: L19 - Stable Compiler Version
findings.description: Not locking the pragma version, allowing incompatible compiler versions and potentially introducing vulnerabilities.
